SELECT ID as "id" , HOSTNAME as "hostName" , LFNC_NM as "lFncNm" , MFNC_NM as "mFncNm" , SFNC_NM as "sFncNm" , DETAIL_FNC_NM as "detailFncNm" , METHOD_NM as "methodNm" , FRST_REGISTER_ID as "frstRegisterId" , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as "frstRegistPnttm" , LAST_UPDUSR_ID as "lastUpdUsrId" , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as "lastUpdtPnttm" FROM COMTJOBFNCLIST WHERE ID = '${ID}'

SELECT ID as "id" , HOSTNAME as "hostName" , LFNC_NM as "lFncNm" , MFNC_NM as "mFncNm" , SFNC_NM as "sFncNm" , DETAIL_FNC_NM as "detailFncNm" , METHOD_NM as "methodNm" , FRST_REGISTER_ID as "frstRegisterId" , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM as "frstRegistPnttm" , LAST_UPDUSR_ID as "lastUpdUsrId" , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM as "lastUpdtPnttm" FROM COMTJOBFNCLIST WHERE 1=1 AND METHOD_NM = '${METHOD_NM}' AND HOSTNAME = '${HOSTNAME}'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTJOBFNCLIST SET LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , HOSTNAME = '${HOSTNAME}' , LFNC_NM = '${LFNC_NM}' , MFNC_NM = '${MFNC_NM}' , SFNC_NM = '${SFNC_NM}' , DETAIL_FNC_NM = '${DETAIL_FNC_NM}' , METHOD_NM = '${METHOD_NM}' WHERE ID = '${ID}'
mapper.select: SELECT B.OCCRRNC_DE as "occrrncDe" , A.HOSTNAME as "hostname" , A.LFNC_NM as "lfncNm" , A.MFNC_NM as "mfncNm" , A.SFNC_NM as "sfncNm" , A.DETAIL_FNC_NM as "detailFncNm" , A.METHOD_NM as "methodNm" , B.CREAT_CO as "creatCo" , B.UPDT_CO as "updtCo" , B.RDCNT as "rdCnt" , B.DELETE_CO as "deleteCo" , B.ERROR_CO as "errorCo" FROM COMTJOBFNCLIST A, COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY B WHERE 1=1 AND A.HOSTNAME = B.HOSTNAME AND A.METHOD_NM = B.METHOD_NM ORDER BY B.OCCRRNC_DE DESC

SELECT B.OCCRRNC_DE as "occrrncDe" , A.HOSTNAME as "hostname" , SUM(B.CREAT_CO) as "creatCo" , SUM(B.UPDT_CO) as "updtCo" , SUM(B.RDCNT) as "rdCnt" , SUM(B.DELETE_CO) as "deleteCo" , SUM(B.ERROR_CO) as "errorCo" FROM COMTJOBFNCLIST A, COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY B WHERE 1=1 AND A.HOSTNAME = B.HOSTNAME AND A.METHOD_NM = B.METHOD_NM GROUP BY B.OCCRRNC_DE, A.HOSTNAME ORDER BY B.OCCRRNC_DE DESC
